title: Thunder Orc (Part 2)
body:
Thunder Orc (Part 2)

Austin glanced back when he heard the sound of thunder crackling.

With his skill thought acceleration activated he watched in slow motion, as two pairs of four wings made from thunder materialized at the back of the orc.

A wicked grin was plastered on its hideous looking face as it watched Austin trying to fly away.

The orc flapped the lighting wings

Booooommm-!

The sound barrier was instantly broken, and like a bullet the orc shot towards Austin.

Even with his thought acceleration skill activated, he barely saw the orc moving before it appeared just behind his back, punching him with its fist covered in thunder.

The space in two meters area around them was wrapped and twisted because of the sheer force behind the punch of the orc that looks like it can even shatter a mountain.

'Fu*k' Austin's eyes opened wide feeling the power behind the punch.
